<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Generate password reset token</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v1/user/{username}/credential/reset-token"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-public: "true"
```



Triggers the forgot password flow where a password reset token is emailed to a validated user

## Request
